ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: I am grateful to colleagues in the LUCID consortium who commented on an early draft of this article. I also like to thank an anonymous reviewer for insightful and constructive comments. The research was funded by the Swedish Research Council Formas through the Linnaeus grants LUCID, Lund University Centre of Excellence for integration of Social and Natural Dimensions of Sustainability (259-2008-1718) and The Rush for Land in Africa (2012/7689).
